optimization.stochastic.algorithms

Class GABasicFitnessProportional

  • java.lang.Object
    • optimization.stochastic.algorithms.GABasicFitnessProportional
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptimizationAlgorithmInterface

    public class GABasicFitnessProportional
extends java.lang.Object
implements OptimizationAlgorithmInterface
    This class implements the basic GA protocol where the selection probability for the solutions is proportional to their fitness.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GABasicFitnessProportional

        public GABasicFitnessProportional(java.lang.Object[] population,
                          MutationInterface mutator,
                          RecombinationInterface recombiner,
                          FitnessEvaluator fe,
                          int numIter)
        Parameters:
        population - Population of solutions to be optimized.
        mutator - An object responsible for inducing mutations.
        recombiner - An object responsible for recombining solutions.
        fe - FitnessEvaluator object for evaluating fitness of individual solutions.
        numIter - Number of iterations to run.
